welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ternat, Belgium! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Ternat has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free for the first 2 hours, then a fee may apply for longer use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.
